name: Command
description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

<b> Approach. <r> The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.
<b> Drop. <r> The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.
<b> Flee. <r> The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.
<b> Grovel. <r> The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.
<b> Halt. <r> On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action.
upcast_description: You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.
